summary: After receiving two separate marriage proposals, Natalie asks the gang to reunite in Peekskill, NY.
cast: Mindy Cohn|Kim Fields|Lisa Whelchel|Mark Lutz|Barclay Hope|Joel Brooks|Kevin Jubinville|Carl Marotte|Alexandra Johnson|Mallory Margel|Joe Dinicol|Charlotte Rae|François Klanfer|Adam Greydon Reid|Barry Stillwell|Jennifer Foster|John Gilbert|Sam Moses|Karen Glave|John Bayliss|Ken A. Smith|Evan Caravela|Clancy Cauble|Rob Tinkler
title: The Facts of Life Reunion
